description: Fragrant, crunchy and satisfying. Try this basil pesto potato salad recipe with red cabbage and almonds for an easy lunch or side. Perfect for a family gathering.
keywords: Pesto Potato Salad With Red Cabbage
name: Pesto Potato Salad With Red Cabbage Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add pesto to potato, tossing to coat. Season, then divide potato and cabbage among plates. Scatter over extra almonds, basil and parmesan to serve.
